Articles.Content: Just read about the new port coming to consoles and was wondering if people who owned the game currently on console will have free access to the new port.

11 minutes ago, ndinardo07 said:

Just read about the new port coming to consoles and was wondering if people who owned the game currently on console will have free access to the new port.

I don't recall exactly where I heard it, but I think that Squad has confirmed that current console users will have access to the new port.

Oh, and welcome aboard!
